name: FLAMESKULL
condition_immunities: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, Prone

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The flameskull sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The flameskull has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.text: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its Hit Points in 1 hour unless Holy Water is sprinkled on its remains or the Dispel Evil and Good spell is cast on them.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The flameskull makes two Fire Ray attacks.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The flameskull casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): At Will: Mage Hand. 2/Day: Magic Missile (level 2 version). 1/Day: Fireball.
